casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Americare Corp., Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio; Hartley, Appellant.

[Cite as State ex rel. Americare Corp. v. Indus. Comm. (1999), 87 Ohio St.3d 35.]

(No. 99-606 Submitted August 25, 1999 Decided October 13, 1999.) *36Schottenstein, Zox & Dunn Co., L.P.A., and Patrick A. Devine, for appellee. Barkan & Neff, L.P.A., and Robert E. DeRose, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed, and the order of the Industrial Commission is reinstated.

Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur. Moyer, C.J., Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., dissent. Lundberg Stratton, J.,

dissenting. I respectfully dissent. I would affirm the judgment of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., and Cook, J., concur in the foregoing dissenting opinion.
